channel.title: drupal-admin on IT Quicktasks
channel.description: Recent content in drupal-admin on IT Quicktasks

item.title: Clear Drupal Cache Outside Drush
item.description: From drupal admin UI: Administration > Configuration > Development > Performance But will work only if you have drupal admin login. Otherwise, you need to install drush instead and do the ‘drush cc all’ from there. Some other options -> https://www.drupal.org/docs/7/administering-drupal-7-site/clearing-or-rebuilding-drupals-cache
